trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The concerned townsdwarf is wrestling with her worries.
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the sulking townsdwarf.
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_TODO_01<tab>/cheer up the sulking townsdwarf.
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the concerned townsdwarf.
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_GOSSIP03554_000_000<tab>I hope she'll be all right...
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_GOSSIP03554_000_001<tab>Oh, lali-ho! Sorry, I was off in my own little world there...

TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_GOSSIP03554_000_002<tab>I just can't shake the sight of it─my best friend, meeting in secret with one of them filthy, no-good Goggs. If the others were to hear about this, her honor would be forfeit!

TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_GOSSIP03554_000_003<tab>So can you believe I saw her heading out into Scree─alone─not a few moments ago? At least she had the decency to hang her head in shame. Please, stranger, I need you to convince her to stop this madness while I keep the chief's attention elsewhere.
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_DWARF03554_000_010<tab>...Come back to the village? No, I bloody well will not! I need to be alone. Have you never felt the pain of heartbreak!?
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_DWARF03554_000_011<tab>Argh! I m-mean... Just go away!
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_DWARF03554_000_012<tab>...Bah, I might as well tell you now, eh? I was in love with a Gogg.

TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_DWARF03554_000_013<tab>It all began the day a cliffkite attacked me as I was coming home from the mines. <var 1A 02 /var>He<var 1A 01 /var> saved me from becoming its dinner. He was strapping and sweet, and so I learned his patrol route. Brought him iguana tails, talked about sediment─you know, the usual stuff.
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_DWARF03554_000_014<tab>Then, once we'd gotten to know each other, I confessed my feelings. But he refused me, saying he could never court a Tholl. Said it was impossible...

TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_DWARF03554_000_015<tab><sniff> I almost wish he'd left me for the cliffkite... But he's probably right. Who in Tomra would recognize our love? Who is there to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>cheer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> me on?
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_DWARF03554_000_020<tab><sniff> Won't anyone <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>cheer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> for our love...?
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_DWARF03554_000_021<tab>...Thank you. There'll be few enough kind words for me if news gets out. But I won't give up! I'll think of a way for my Gogg and I to be together!
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_GOSSIP03554_000_030<tab>I see you got my friend to come back, but she was in too much of a hurry to spare me a second glance. What happened out there?
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_A1_000_001<tab>Explain the situation.
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_A1_000_002<tab>Keep your mouth shut.
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_GOSSIP03554_000_031<tab>She fell in <var 1A 02 /var>love<var 1A 01 /var> with him!? With a Gogg? Ugh, the chief can never know about this...
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_GOSSIP03554_000_032<tab>Not your place to say, eh? Well, I was meaning to talk to her about this anyway...
TEXT_LUCKZI018_03554_GOSSIP03554_000_033<tab>Thank you for your help, stranger. I'll do my best to keep her out of trouble!
